name: Fantasy Combat Simulator
description:
Fantasy Combat Simulator
- WIP
- no sound yet
- enemies are missing passive skills atm

Tab - Weapon Swap
V - Vendor Shop (Respite Zone only)
B - Storage (Respite Zone only)
M - Map
A - Attribute
S - Skills
I - Inventory/Equipment
Esc - Save/Exit or Close All Menus

Hold down [Key]
Shift - to stay stationary
Space - show items on the ground
[Hotbar Hotkey] - activate [Channeling] skills

Death
- press/click any key to close death screen

Hotbar
- You can place Skills and Potions in Hotbar Slots (Q, W, E, R, T, D, F, G, M1, M2)
- Right click on hotbar slot to remove assigned skill/item

Respite Zone
- areas with level zero sub level.

Skill Synergy
- You can combine skills (some are compatible and not)
- First place a skill on an empty hotbar slot - this will be the base skill
- Then place another skill over the base skill

Inventory Item Stack
- Hold down [Ctrl] and click on an item to take from its stack

Check out @joedman593 for previous updates
i'll be posting here in itch too for future updates
